hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOCS_ID, EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY.CREATOR, EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY.CREATE_TIME, EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY.MODIFIER, EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY.MODIFY_TIME, EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY.REC_VER, EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY.REC_STATUS, EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY.ORG_ID, EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY.TIME_ZONE, EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY.PM_CODE, EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY.COMPANY_CODE, EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY.SITE_CODE, EOCS_CODE, EOCS_NAME, EOCS_NAME_EN, EOCS_REMARK, ESUS.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_CREATOR_NAME, ESUSM.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_MODIFIER_NAME, EOCS_PRIORITY FROM EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUS ON EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY.CREATOR = ESUS.ESUS_ID LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUSM ON EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY.MODIFIER = ESUSM.ESUS_ID WHERE 1=1 << AND EO_CONFIRM_STRATEGY.REC_STATUS = :recStatus >> << AND EOCS_CODE = :eocsCode >> << AND EOCS_NAME LIKE :eocsName >> << AND EOCS_PRIORITY = :eocsPriority >> order by EOCS_PRIORITY desc
